overview: Richard Lugar: Reason's Quiet Warrior is an hour-long documentary that chronicles the life and times of Sen. Richard Lugar, retired, who served as one of Indiana's U.S. Senators from 1977 to 2013. Richard Lugar helped transform Indianapolis from 'India-no-place" to a booming metropolitan community and later as a Senator helped make the world a safer place.
title: Richard Lugar: Reason's Quiet Warrior
